title: 国庆节你们都干了啥
author: xuwei666
txt_content: 我写作业，玩电脑。2点一线233

replies.author: Because.
replies.txt_content:
I did my homework everyday





---------“多美的景色，如阳光般的你。”

replies.author: WarbleOrigin
replies.txt_content: 然而除了水帖加写作业没干什么233

replies.author: minehenry
replies.txt_content: 国庆前想国庆能干很多事..结果什么也没干成
